decisionMechanism

Class Decider

  • java.lang.Object
    • decisionMechanism.Decider

  • public class Decider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class decides which is the best algorithm to use for a given user Scenario based on the calculations of the DistanceCalculator s. The calculation is based on the user Scenario and the ideal Scenarios of each AbstractAlgorithm. This class highly depends on ONE user scenario. There is a Decider for each single user scenario! The Decider outputs a high score of the AbstractAlgorithms.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<DistanceCalculator> highscore
      The high score is specific for the userScenarioDeepCopy and lists the AbstractAlgorithms

      The scenario setting of the user.

    • Field Detail

      • highscore

        private final java.util.List<DistanceCalculator> highscore
        The high score is specific for the userScenarioDeepCopy and lists the AbstractAlgorithms

      • userScenarioDeepCopy

        public final Scenario userScenarioDeepCopy
        The scenario setting of the user. This is a deep copy of the original scenario.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Decider

        public Decider(Scenario userScenario)
        Constructor will make a deep copy of the user scenario. The algorithm scenarios are always constant. A DistanceCalculator will be created for each AbstractAlgorithm, which keeps track of the distance from the user Scenario to the algorithm Scenario.
        Parameters:
        userScenario -

    • Method Detail

      • criterionActivationChange

        public void criterionActivationChange(java.lang.String criterionID,
                             boolean active)
        A criterion was activated or deactivated. An deactivated criterion has to be excluded from calculation, and an activated has to be included.
        Parameters:
        criterionID -
        active -

      • getHighscore

        public java.util.List<DistanceCalculator> getHighscore()
        Sorts the high score by distances before it is passed
        Returns:
        high score

      • updateCriterionChange

        public void updateCriterionChange(Criterion criterion)
        This is called by the DecisionMechanism, if a Criterion of the #userScenarioDeepCopy has changed. The overall distance from the user scenario to each algorithm scenario changes with + or - of the changed value.
        Parameters:
        criterion -
